title: Living tomorrow. No. 146
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Often being forced to rethink and see things in a different way can open up a vast avenue of approach to new ideas. Looks at recent developments of science in road safety, agriculture, health and aviation, which grew out of just this kind of rethinking.
